TEXT.S:
Tjusepayuan
sikay nu niyazu' i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Tjusepayuan. u kasalumaluma' nu Tjusepayuan sa, 148 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 504 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 498 ku tademaw, pakalatu 99%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 6 ku tademaw, pakalatu 1%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 83%, Rukai 10%, Bunun 1%, zumazuma 5%.
